equipments.description: The multi-tube manometer measures pressure differences in fluids, helping engineers analyze fluid behavior and troubleshoot pressure-related issues.

equipments.name: Cut Section Model of Complete Both Side Double Wishbone Suspension Strut with Drive Shaft
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Automobiles Lab/Cut Section Model of Complete Both Side Double Wishbone Suspension Strut with Drive Shaft
equipments.description: This model illustrates the double wishbone suspension system with a drive shaft, showcasing how this configuration enhances handling and stability in vehicles.

equipments.name: Surface Roughness Tester
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Surface Roughness Tester
equipments.description: A precision instrument used to measure the roughness or texture of a material's surface. It quantifies surface irregularities or deviations from a perfectly smooth surface, which are critical for understanding the material's functionality in various applications like friction, wear, and appearance.

equipments.name: Temperature Measuring Setup
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Temperature Measuring Setup
equipments.description: An instrument used to accurately measure the temperature of a system or environment, consisting of temperature sensors, a display or data acquisition system, and a power supply.

equipments.name: Force Measuring Setup
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Force Measuring Setup
equipments.description: An instrument used to measure the magnitude of force applied to an object or system, consisting of a load cell or force transducer, a display unit, and necessary mounting fixtures.

equipments.name: Torque Measuring Setup
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Torque Measuring Setup
equipments.description: An instrument used to measure the rotational force or torque applied to a shaft or mechanical component, typically consisting of a torque sensor or transducer, and a display or data acquisition system.

equipments.name: Linear Air Track Apparatus
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Linear Air Track Apparatus
equipments.description: Used to study the principles of motion, conservation of momentum, and collisions, consisting of a long, horizontal track with a low-friction surface, typically supported by a cushion of air.

equipments.name: Dial Gauge Calibration Setup
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Dial Gauge Calibration Setup
equipments.description: Used to accurately calibrate dial gauges with a measurement range of 0-25mm and a least count (L.C.) of 0.001mm, using a precision measuring surface such as a micrometer or standard reference block.

equipments.name: Height Gauge
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Height Gauge
equipments.description: A precision instrument used to measure the height or vertical dimensions of objects with high accuracy, typically consisting of a vertical column, a measuring probe, and a base.

equipments.name: Profile Projector
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Profile Projector
equipments.description: An optical measuring instrument used to project a magnified image of an object's profile onto a screen for precise measurement and inspection.

equipments.name: Floating Carriage Micrometer
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Floating Carriage Micrometer
equipments.description: A precision instrument used for the accurate measurement of thread plug gauges, ensuring measurements are taken along the correct axis, even for irregular or tapered surfaces.

equipments.name: Sine Bar
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Sine Bar
equipments.description: A precision measuring tool used to measure or set angles with high accuracy, typically used in conjunction with slip gauge blocks to set or measure the angles of components.

equipments.name: 3-D Coordinate Measuring Machine
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/3-D Coordinate Measuring Machine
equipments.description: A precision instrument used to measure the geometry of physical objects by sensing discrete points on the surface of the object with a probe, capturing 3D coordinates for accurate measurement.

equipments.name: Gear Tooth Vernier
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Gear Tooth Vernier
equipments.description: A specialized measuring instrument used to precisely measure the thickness of gear teeth and dimensions of hobs, form tools, and thread tools.

equipments.name: Slip Gauge
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Slip Gauge
equipments.description: A precision measuring tool used to establish or verify exact lengths with high accuracy, consisting of calibrated blocks that can be stacked together to achieve a desired measurement.

equipments.name: Straight Edge
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Straight Edge
equipments.description: A simple measuring tool used to draw straight lines or check the straightness of a surface or object, typically made from metal, wood, or plastic.

equipments.name: Ring Gauge
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Ring Gauge
equipments.description: A precision tool used to measure the external dimensions of cylindrical parts, specifically their diameter, ensuring that the outer diameter of a workpiece fits within the desired tolerance range.

equipments.name: Filler Gauge
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Filler Gauge
equipments.description: A filler gauge, also known as a feeler gauge, is a precision measuring tool used to measure the clearance or gap between two parts. It consists of a series of thin, flat metal blades, each with a different thickness, typically marked in thousandths of an inch or millimeters.

equipments.name: Snap Gauge
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Snap Gauge
equipments.description: A snap gauge is a precision measuring tool used to measure the external dimensions, such as the diameter or thickness, of cylindrical or flat workpieces. It consists of two adjustable arms or jaws, a set of anvils, and a measuring scale.

equipments.name: V-Block
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/V-Block
equipments.description: A V-block is a precision tool used to securely hold cylindrical workpieces, such as shafts or rods, during machining operations like milling, drilling, or grinding. The V-shaped groove in the block is designed to accommodate the cylindrical shape of the workpiece.

equipments.name: Pitch Gauge
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Pitch Gauge
equipments.description: A pitch gauge is a precision measuring tool used to measure the pitch of threads on screws, bolts, or other threaded components. The pitch refers to the distance between adjacent threads, which is critical for ensuring the correct fit and function of threaded parts.

equipments.name: Go & No-Go Gauge
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Go & No-Go Gauge
equipments.description: A Go and No-Go gauge is a precision tool used to check whether a part’s dimensions are within specified tolerance limits. It consists of two parts: the 'Go' gauge to check minimum acceptable size and the 'No-Go' gauge to check maximum allowable size.

equipments.name: Surface Plate
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Surface Plate
equipments.description: A surface plate is a solid, flat reference plane used for precision inspection, marking out, and tooling setup. Made from materials such as granite, cast iron, or steel, it provides a stable and smooth base for measuring and checking the flatness, dimensions, and geometry of components.

equipments.name: Micro Weight Balance
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Micro Weight Balance
equipments.description: A micro weight balance, also known as a microbalance, is a highly sensitive instrument used to measure the mass of objects with extremely low weight, often in the range of milligrams or even micrograms.

equipments.name: Micrometer
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Micrometer
equipments.description: A micrometer is a precision measuring tool used to measure the thickness, depth, or length of an object with high accuracy, typically in the range of micrometers (millionths of a meter). It consists of a spindle and anvil that form a measuring gap.

equipments.name: Vernier Caliper
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Vernier Caliper
equipments.description: A Vernier caliper is a precision measuring instrument used to measure the internal and external dimensions of objects, as well as their depths. It consists of a main scale and a sliding Vernier scale that provides precise measurements with high accuracy.

equipments.name: Depth Gauge
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Depth Gauge
equipments.description: A depth gauge is a precision instrument used to measure the depth of holes, recesses, or grooves in a workpiece. It consists of a probe or measuring rod that is mounted on a scale, allowing the user to measure the depth of a cavity or indentation accurately.

equipments.name: Bevel Protector
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Bevel Protector
equipments.description: A bevel protector is a tool used to measure and protect the angles or bevels on the edges of materials, typically in machining, construction, or metalworking. It ensures that the beveled edges of components meet precise specifications.

equipments.name: Dial Gauge
equipments.image: ../../assets/New BTP/Measurement Instrumentation and Control Laboratory/Dial Gauge
equipments.description: A dial gauge is a precision instrument used to measure small linear displacements with high accuracy, typically in the range of micrometers or thousandths of an inch. It consists of a dial face with a needle that moves in response to a mechanical probe.
